subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic hammered Marin Cilic, 6-0, 6-1, 6-2, and has a chance to win his third major this year. He will have to beat Roger Federer, who defeated Stan Wawrinka, 6-4, 6-3, 6-1.
snippet: Novak Djokovic hammered Marin Cilic, 6-0, 6-1, 6-2, and has a chance to win his third major this year. He will have to beat Roger Federer, who defeated Stan Wawrinka, 6-4, 6-3, 6-1.
